title.a: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire 01/07/2023 INC#0090

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0090; 02:31AM; 2647 N Pasadena Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3jUyI0G; #LincolnHeights; Firefighters arrived to find a vacant two-story multi-family residential structure fully involved with fire. Firefighters engaged in defensive firefighting operations (from the exterior only) with large-diameter hose lines. After knocking back the flames, firefighters transitioned interior to an offensive attack to finish off the hard-to-reach areas and remaining hot spots. It took 45 firefighters 54 minutes to extinguish the flames, while successfully protecting neighboring buildings. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AR1 BC1 BC2 CM20 CM22 E12 E2 E201 E202 E212 E44 E47 EM1 EM9 RA12 RA2 RA801 T1 T12 T2; CH7; 15; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0090; 01:37AM; 2651 N Pasadena Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OE34Pz; #LincolnHeights; Two-story residential building with heavy fire showing. Defensive mode.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC2 CM20 CM22 E12 E2 E201 E202 E212 E44 E47 EM1 EM9 RA2 RA801 T1 T12 T2; CH9; 15; Nicholas Prange

Update Structure Fire; INC#1604; 09:00PM; 5820 N Cartwright Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3W17hQk; #NorthHollywood; A 55-year-old female occupant with burn injuries was transported to the hospital in moderate condition. Firefighters were able to save her canine, recovering it from inside the structure unharmed, which is now being cared for by a neighbor.; FS 60; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; AR1 BC14 E260 E60 E86 RA60 RA86 T60; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1622; 08:35PM; 430 E 108th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3W17ZNu; #GreenMeadows; Twenty firefighters extinguished the flames inside of a one-story bungalow in 12 minutes, without injury. Cause under investigation.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E264 E64 E65 RA264 RA64 RA864 T64; CH7; 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1622; 08:23PM; 430 E 108th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3W17ZNu; #GreenMeadows; One-story bungalow with fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E264 E64 E65 RA264 RA64 T64; CH9; 14; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1604; 08:25PM; 5820 N Cartwright Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3W17hQk; #NorthHollywood; It took 20 firefighters 19 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish a contents fire that extended into the attic inside of a one-story home that contained excessive storage within. One adult female to be transported to a local hospital with burn injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 60; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E260 E60 E86 RA60 RA86 T60; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1604; 08:06PM; 5820 N Cartwright Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3W17hQk; #NorthHollywood; One-story single-family home with smoke showing from the attic. Offensive mode.; FS 60; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E260 E60 E86 RA60 RA86 T60; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1104; 03:27PM; 862 E 35th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3jXIuPI; Historic South-Central; It took 30 firefighters 14 minutes to extinguish the flames in a one-story duplex. Firefighters coordinated an interior attack with rooftop ventilation to confine the fire to the living space and attic of the unit-of-origin (damage to only one of the two occupancies within the duplex). The occupants appeared to be gone at the time of the fire. No reported injuries. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 E14 E21 E221 E229 RA15 RA246 RA814 SQ21 T21 T29; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1104; 03:13PM; 862 E 35th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3jXIuPI; Historic South-Central; *Tentative Address* One-story residential dwelling with fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 E14 E21 E221 RA15 RA246 T21; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1533; 08:09PM; 2387 N Earls Ct; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Zekiss; #BelAir; *Corrected Address* It took 46 firefighters 45 minutes to strategically confine the fire to its point of origin on the second floor above an attached garage, and extinguish the flames, while limiting the spread and reducing possible damage from firefighting efforts. No occupants appeared to be home at the time of the fire. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 109; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; BC10 BC9 CM40 CM42 E109 E237 E239 E288 E39 E88 E99 EM9 RA19 RA88 RA99 T37 T39 T88; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange
